title: 87/178/EEC: Council Decision of 9 March 1987 giving a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) for the financial year 1985
header:
COUNCIL  DECISION
of 9 March 1987
giving a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) for the financial year 1985
(87/178/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Council shall close the revenue and expenditure accounts of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) as at 31 December 1985 as follows:
- revenue: at the sum of 916 516 474,85 ECU,
- expenditure (payments): at the sum of 881 455 921,20 ECU.
The Council hereby gives a discharge to the Commission in respect of the implementation of the operations of the European Development Fund (1969) (Third EDF) for the financial year 1985.
